history.content: hi there, your question is a little unclear so i'm not sure if both departments now have separate copies of the same document (they both need to sign the same one). Wait until you're admitted to the major and then you can just follow up with both offices to get the form signed.

Hi! I submitted my forms for CS declaration tonight. I also wish to declare CogSci and have submitted my major declaration forms and double major packet to those advisors for signature as well, but was not able to get those in time to submit the double major packet with their signatures to the CS form. Is this okay, or what should I do?
history.subject: Double Major Declaration
